title: Character teleporting, minions vibrating and keep disconnecting however ping is at 261
body: Was playing a bot game today as Mordekaiser and this happened to me. My character, characters of my allies and the enemy champions are all teleporting around the map. Minions are all vibrating and my ping is below 261. FPS is constantly going up and down but is around 50 most of the time. Also all the jungle camps are empty. i also keep getting attempting to reconnect .

replies.body: Something i forgot to mention, my friend which is partying with me got the same problem too. He says he can't see enemy champions and the only enemy champion that is on his screen is Ryze.

After that bot game me and my friend played a custom game and the result is the same. We are still teleporting and sometimes the minions become invisible and my friend playing as Nidalee on the opposite side was invisible to me. He said my Mordekaiser is invisible to her too.
